title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 January 2016 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has quit  
07:26 <sdumitriu> has quit  
07:41 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
07:47 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <mflorea> has quit  
09:35 <risherry> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:24 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
16:48 <risherry> has quit  
17:01 <vmassol> thanks sdumitriu  
17:01 <sdumitriu> No problem  
17:01 <vmassol> I hope we'll be able to have a lightweight runtime in 2016, at least lighter than the current one which has become heavy over the years :)  
17:03 <vmassol> (then users and community can make flavors if they want pre-made bundles) but I think our open source project ought to deliver a neutral lighweight XWiki runtime. FTR this was this thread: http://markmail.org/message/keo7cs6u3fuf676w  
17:04 <vmassol> note to self: reply to Denis last point and redo a proposal for where to move non core modules  
17:35 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:40 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
19:45 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
20:08 <cjd> has quit  
20:21 <mflorea> has quit  
21:56 <MasterPiece> has quit  
21:58 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
23:07 <vmassol> has quit  
23:36 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
23:56 <abusenius> has quit
